class.name: AudioEffectNoiseSuppression
class.brief_description: Adds noise suppression to an audio bus.
class.description: Uses the RNNoise library to remove background noise, leaving only human speech in the audio stream.

method.name: get_voice_activation_probability
method.description: Returns the current probability that a human voice is audible, between 0 (only silence or background noise) and 1 (audible human speech).

members.member: Toggle whether RNNoise should work on each audio channel independently or not. As the most common application for this effect is for voice-chat, which rarely requires stereo audio, it can be more performant to disable this setting.
